Text.Page:
You are the dawn's horizon, ever sought by the sun. Or so it seems. You must overcome the trials of Balderâ€™s Temple to prove yourself worthy of the sun.

The first trial is to open the labyrinth's locked gate.

No key is required. Instead, you must prove your strength by defeating {@LinkCreature:425#1000$$Kakun}, the ruler of the outer gardens!

The sun itself shines on you and your victory.

Your next trial awaits. Find your way through the labyrinth and consult the {@Creature:425#3024#repository of wisdom} on the other side.
